Attorney: The Video Game. Now all the excitement of doing legal research, reconciling conflicting court precedent, drafting legal briefs, and making arguments to a disinterested panel of judges can be yours at home. Why spend thousands of dollars on law school and go into years of crushing debt when you can experience all the excitement of rainmaking, sucking up to senior partners, and responding to bar complaints from your vitrual clients for the low, low price of $59.99?

Surprise! It's a public restroom, so, guess what? The viruses and bacteria are already 'spread all over the room'. Researchers are the laziest thinkers, but the press no longer does true investigative reporting, so specious claims go unchallenged.

Strict time schedules? Um...I believe those time schedules can be adjusted and make allowance for ships to not hit and kill a whale or two or a hundred. Maybe hire whale spotters during the migration months, or all year round, to spot and track whales and communicate with the incoming and outgoing ships the long and lat coordinates of the whales. Just an out there what if thought. The lack of decency and common sense of some individuals is appalling. Adjusting time schedules...Not rocket science. All creatures great and small have the right to life. Holy Moby Dick Batman!
